short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Timeline clock displays the current time in a continuous timeline. This allows you to keep a closer eye on the advancing time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Timeline clock provides an innovative and unique way to visually represent the current time. Instead of a conventional display, Timeline clock utilizes a continuous timeline seamlessly integrated into your browser. This intelligent representation enables you to not only discern the exact time but also grasp the progressing events of time at a glance.
